data.title: Michigan Central Station OPEN
data.meta_description: Celebrate Michigan Central at the opening concert June 6 or during one of the open house tours June 7-16.
data.text:
Following an extensive six-year renovation by Ford Motor Company, the once-abandoned train station has reopened its doors as the centerpiece of Michigan Central, a 30-acre technology and cultural hub in Detroitâs Corktown neighborhood.

While Fordâs investment is crucial to the companyâs long-term planning, it also represents a commitment to the city of Detroit and its future, with The Station becoming a beacon of development and opportunity.
